turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! I'm in the car on the way to the office. Can you please order me some coffee? I'll pick it up on my way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Where do you want me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Call the Starbucks on Steinway Street in Astoria, the one between Broadway and 31st Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'm going to try to order it online. What exactly do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool! See if they still have the iced salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they still have it available. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I definitely want the Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Real whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and do you want it with or without whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it with whipped cream and chocolate sauce instead of the caramel sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's not giving me the option to change sauce flavor.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, then just leave it with the caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Fine, order is done. Do you want extra vanilla or brown sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, to both. Vanilla and 3 packs or teaspoons of brown sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I placed the order and it says it should be ready for pick-up in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Really, I'll be there in 5 minutes. Is there any way to speed it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, after you place the order it just confirms the time but doesn't give me any choice. It says "pick up at Starbucks 31-44 Steinway St, Astoria, NY 11103 in 20 minutes".

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll just have to find parking then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hopefully they'll have it sooner.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks, we;ll talk later.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye, and let me know if there is a problem with your order.
